title: When are the new runes online?
body:
Hey guys just a quick question .. season 7 ends this night at 23:59 . ok .
But will the new runes so come out after 00:00?? 

Sry for maybe a dumb question . I never waited so impatiently for a new season.

replies.body:
With the release of 7.22 (in less word : with the new patch) imho.
Btw use this https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/.
This is an Italian forum.
I'm surprised that someone in this forums know to say more than "hi, my name is ..." in english

And I do not understand why, if there is a forum suitable for you, or whatever nationality you are, occasionally appearing English discussions on the Italian forum. And also, come and pick us as ignorant ... But why do not you go break somewhere else? These comments are not accepted by any community, which may be the Italian, French, Russian, Spanish or any other community, a community would not like to be taken as ignorant only because some people do not know English, you you have to come to understand that rightly I do not all know English, so you do not have to go stupid in writing, writing things like "wow, I'm surprised that there are not only people who know how to write / say how they are called in English". Because if I ask you, "tell me how do you call it" in Italian, obviously you do not know it, and I could call you ignorant, so think twice before giving ignorance to someone. Especially if you have targeted a whole community, whether Italian or not.


P. S i want to reconnect with your statement, that you are surprised that you have not only found people who and ... blah blah blah blah, i want to add another thing about it, that is, this: "i am surprised how in the world there they are more and more idiotic and stupid people. "
Actually... I can say it in italian too, perché sono italiano e conosco molta gente ignorante che non sa l'inglese :p

E allora perché hai scritto in inglese? Non vedo il senso logico della cosa. E cmq, non puoi pretendere che OGNUNO sulla faccia della terra possa sapere l'inglese, e che magari non gli piace e preferisce parlare il francese, il cinese mandarino per fare degli esempi. Ma cmq, ragionare in questo modo, a me non mi scende giù, perché la figura la fai tu e non chi hai preso di mira.

no new runes will online at start to the 7.22 cycle 

Next time as to the english forum
